column2: A problem has been detected in order to get offers from API from S32. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
A problem has been detected in order to update offers from API from S32. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
An error message appears during the connection to our API portail : 'User with specified identity already exists'. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
It is not possible to create products from Octopia and Casino using our API yet. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
It is not possible to get products from Octopia and Casino using our API yet. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
